results.question: The number of holes in a stipulated round of golf
The number of times an average person laughs a day
The number of personality types in the Myers-Briggs classification system
The minimum driving age for a car or van in the United Kingdom
The number of Oscar nominations of actress Meryl Streep, who holds the record for the most Oscar nominated actress
The number of times that a typical dairy cow lies down and stands up a day on average
The number of colors the labels for Crayola crayons come in
The number of questions in the popular party game Twenty Questions
The number of days in a fortnight
The number of teams that qualified for the finals of the FIFA World Cup from 1934 through 1978 (although for various reasons, only 15 competed in the 1938 and 1950 finals)
